coreAttributes.name: Kitty's Reward
coreAttributes.description: A small, square food tin with a ring-pull lid. A label on the side shows a greater cat-girl devouring a plate of what looks to be this can's contents; some sort of tinned salmon.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel [npc.her] arcane power increasing...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_ARCANE, 3)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] back the ring-pull and [npc.verb(peel)] off the lid to the can of Kitty's Reward. A rich, fishy smell accompanies the sight of what looks to be tinned salmon, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(find)] [npc.herself] unable to resist the tasty-looking meat. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(wolf)] down the can's contents, finding that it was as delicious as it looked.
